directions: Stir boiling water, sugar, and instant coffee together in a bowl until dissolved; cool in refrigerator, 30 minutes to overnight.
Pour coffee mixture into a punch bowl; add milk, vanilla ice cream, and chocolate ice cream. Stir until ice cream begins to melt.
ingredients: 1 (2 ounce) jar instant coffee granules (such as Nescafe®)
title: Southern Coffee Punch
